description:
Since the disappearance of Aine, Tomoharu`s head is full of thoughts of saving Misao. Seeking his brother Naotaka who started everything, Tomoharu goes to Toru to find out how to reach Naotaka. Toru surprises Tomoharu when she asks him to convince Science Club president Tokiya to go to school in exchange for her help.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Burial Doll Eaten by the Demon
悪魔に喰われた副葬処女
